page.title: 20A day in the life of.......
page.content: On Mondays I hate getting up for school.I get up at 8.00am but often I get woken at 06.30 by the alarm to wake my brother for his paper round. Colette calls about 8.30am. We go to Mrs.Tiffin the lollipop lady,and wait for Lois coming off the school coach. Usually we go to the P.O.for sweets & then we go down to school. The bell goes at 9.00am.Mrs Newton does the registers & then it is assembly.On a Monday we do Complete English and Geography, then S.M.P maths ,& P.E. Finally we write down our weeKly spellings and if we have time we listen to some story. At playtime Lois & I sell the crisps to the infants.The bell for lunch goes at 12.00.We are on second sitting so we play out first then I have my sandwiches.At home I watch T.V,play out, or read a book. I go to bed at 9.30p.m.Monday is over!
